item.description: […] Replica Liberty Bell inside the Utah State Capitol building. Not to be confused with the Lego Liberty Bell. […]

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/03/14/lego-liberty-bell/#comment-4315">Eden Krebs</a>.
We went the previous week, so we weren't there when they were giving away the free lego kits.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Eden Krebs.

We went the previous week, so we weren’t there when they were giving away the free lego kits.

item.title: By: Eden Krebs
item.dc:creator: Eden Krebs
item.description: I was there on Saturday as well! Glad you got to see it. Did you like the free lego kit?
item.content:encoded: I was there on Saturday as well! Glad you got to see it. Did you like the free lego kit?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/03/14/lego-liberty-bell/#comment-4313">Jim Vanderveen</a>.
It was part of a Lego display at the local mall.
item.content:encoded:

It was part of a Lego display at the local mall.
